ComicInfo.Summary:
The fate of all the realms of power hangs in the balance as Dorothy battles the Witches of Oz for control of the powerful Viridian Scepter. Don't miss the exciting conclusion to the first Oz series from Zenescope Entertainment!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |---------|-----------------|----------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Ken Lashley & Romulo Fajardo Jr. | 1 | | B | Cover B | Richard Ortiz & Sean Ellery | 2 | | C | Cover C | Carlos Ernesto Gomez & Sanju Nivangune | 3 | | D | Cover D | Alé Garza & Sanju Nivangune | 4 | | Digital | Digital Edition | Ken Lashley & Romulo Fajardo Jr. | 5 |
ComicInfo.Title: Part 6 of 6; Death In the Emerald City
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alé Garza,Carlos Gomez (SP),Ken Lashley,Richard Ortiz,Romulo Fajardo Jr.,Sanju Nivangune,Sean Ellery
